short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EasyTasker.io for Asana, built by TeamKickstart.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With EasyTasker for Asana, built by TeamKickstart.com, you can instantly turn any tab, browser window, email, YouTube video, LinkedIn post, Facebook post, or tweet into a task automatically, or create any task from anywhere and add it to any project without being in Asana.
---
